job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Hi, We are have an opportunity for the below job. We will request you to revert back with your resume. Position: Data ScientistLocation: Plano TX (Currently Remote â Will be Onsite until the further announcement.Duration: Long TermJob Description:Duties to Performâ¢	Build proof-of-concept models using a prototype infrastructureâ¢	Bring proof-of-concept models into production using prototype infrastructureâ¢	Communicate shortcomings or improvements to multi-language API for database interactionâ¢	Build proof-of-concept feature engineering batch and streaming jobs â¢	Create and present Powerpoint decks describing work to both technical and non-technical audiencesâ¢	Assist in design and brainstorming sessions for prototype capabilitiesRequired Skill & Experienceâ¢	Expert in Azure Cloud (*Machine Learning*: Event Hub/Streaming Analytics, HDI, DB, Azure ML, Azure Log Analytics, Databricks)â¢	Strong statistics and machine learning fundamentalsâ¢	Demonstrated experience putting models into real-time production â¢	Experience with Python required; R, Scala, and (Java nice to have)â¢	Experience with Spark DataFrame and SQL API's required.  Spark streaming/structured streaming are nice to haveâ¢	Experience with Azure Cloudâ¢	Experience with Databricks(Spark, Delta Lake, MLFlow)â¢	Experience with H2O Driverless AIâ¢	Experience with Kafka/Azure Event Hubâ¢	Strong Team Playerâ¢	Strong problem-solving skillsâ¢	Strong communication skills and the ability to describe shortcomings in system designâ¢	A strong desire and ability to learn new tools and technologies.â¢	Airflow experience is nice to haveTechnical Environmentâ¢	Azureâ¢	SQL / Mongo DBâ¢	Python / Pysparkâ¢	Kafka / EventHubâ¢	Linux and Shell Scriptingâ¢	Possibly R, Scala and Javaâ¢	Databricksâ¢	Azure data production and consumption tools (Event Hub, Azure Functions, Streaming Analytics,Regards,Suganya What's app :91 9043392040.
